column4: Hi all, I am trying to install 11.04 server on HP microserver n36l from USB stick and after selecting language installer complains about not finding cd-rom, anyone can help please?
Did you verify MD5sum on your download? I had major problems on some installs lately due to corrupted downloads
md5 does match actually. This was i386, should have been using amd64 anyway, I'll just download and try that one. Thanks, I will whine some more if I still have troubles, in an hour or so. :)
